column3: Concept ACK\n\nThanks for this! I think this behaviour makes it much clearer and more consistent for all networks.
Concept ACK\n\nNice work! Could include before/after examples in the OP to make it even nicer? :)
> Nice work! Could include before/after examples in the OP to make it even nicer? :)\n\nAdded!

utACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/96f469f91bc02a19703344cc439eab064b72081a\n\nI had similar confusion when reviewing an i2p PR: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22250#issuecomment-861831887

> UPDATE: with -onlynet=ipv4 command-line option:

@hebasto 

Did you see zero for 'onion' after few minutes or had 1 onion outgoing connection for a long time with `onlynet=ipv4`?

I think this won't happen after https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22834 gets merged.
